544670.name: Through the Woods - Soundtrack
544670.description:
Composed for Through the Woods by Daniel Wakefield, the official soundtrack of the game will take you on a journey through chilly Norwegian forests. Listen to 30 original tracks that illustrate in music and sound a desperate mother’s journey to save her missing son, and immerse yourself in a selection of serene and eerie melodies.

Samples:
http://soundcloud.com/trackwriters/credits-theme
http://soundcloud.com/trackwriters/the-climb-theme
544670.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
